local_intent: Perceive red_plate, approach and align above it, lower until contact, place white plate at red_plate_pose, release and retreat.
assumptions: White plate already grasped and stable
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase (after MoveAbove red_plate) from GLOBAL_BT: detection, precise approach/alignment, contact-based lowering, placement, release, and retreat consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
